metadata.title: CVE-2020-16125 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: gdm3 versions before 3.36.2 or 3.38.2 would start gnome-initial-setup ifgdm3 can't contact the accountservice service via dbus in a timely manner;on Ubuntu (and potentially derivatives) this could be be chained with anadditional issue that could allow a local user to create a new privilegedaccount.

criterions.comment: gdm3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
